> comparison_data <- clean_data %>%
+   filter(status %in% c("acquired", "closed"))
> 
> avg_profile <- comparison_data %>%
+   group_by(status) %>%
+   summarise(
+     avg_funding_musd    = mean(funding_total_usd,  na.rm = TRUE) / 1e6,
+     median_funding_musd = median(funding_total_usd, na.rm = TRUE) / 1e6,
+     avg_rounds          = mean(funding_rounds,      na.rm = TRUE),
+     median_rounds       = median(funding_rounds,    na.rm = TRUE),
+     .groups = "drop"
+   )
> 
> plot_df <- avg_profile %>%
+   select(
+     status,
+     `Avg funding (M USD)`    = avg_funding_musd,
+     `Avg rounds`             = avg_rounds,
+     `Median funding (M USD)` = median_funding_musd,
+     `Median rounds`          = median_rounds
+   ) %>%
+   pivot_longer(
+     cols      = -status,
+     names_to  = "metric",
+     values_to = "value"
+   )
> 
> min_val <- min(plot_df$value)
> max_val <- max(plot_df$value)
> 
> plot_df_scaled <- plot_df %>%
+   mutate(
+     value_scaled = (value - min_val) / (max_val - min_val) * 100
+   )
> 
> ggplot(plot_df_scaled,
+        aes(x = metric,
+            y = value_scaled,
+            color = status,
+            group = status)) +
+   geom_point(size = 3) +
+   geom_line(linewidth = 1) +
+   scale_y_continuous(
+     breaks = seq(0, 100, 20),
+     limits = c(0, 100)
+   ) +
+   labs(
+     title = "Average Profile (Scaled 0–100 Across All Metrics)",
+     x = "",
+     y = "Scaled value (0 = smallest, 100 = largest)",
+     color = "Status"
+   ) +
+   theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
+   theme(
+     axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 15, hjust = 1),
+     panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
+   )
